name: Deep Dive (DH)
description:
Help Squidi Linguini return to his mother by navigating through underwater caves.

WASD or Arrow Keys for movement

SPACE Bar for boost

Eat the shrimp to gain the ability to boost yourself

 

Take the red and blue sea shell to gain the ability to attracts objects 

 

(The big green sea shell at the last part can be moved with this more easily) 

Geysers push you in the direction they are blowing
